text: ‫ؠ‬ Certainly ‫ؠ‬ Probably ‫ؠ‬ Probably not (skip ahead to question 15) ‫ؠ‬ Certainly not (skip ahead to question 15) ‫ؠ‬ I don't know (skip ahead to question 15) 14. If you wear a face mask, people may think that you have the new influenza and avoid you. The face mask also causes skin irritation. Would you still wear the face mask?
